title: Game Closet
shortDesc: Create a custom digital collection of your board games that you can search and filter!
description: Using only vanilla JavaScript we created a mobile friendly website that lets you create a customized digitial collection of board games by selecting from a pre-populated set. You can also search through this set of board games, or choose a random board game from your collection

title: Social Circle
shortDesc: jQuery plugin for hiding and revealing your social icons in a circular layout.
description:
SocialCircle is a jQuery plugin that allows the user to reveal and hide radial social share buttons with a toggle button. Also can be used to create a radial popup menu for your website navigation.

You can alter the following settings of the plugin:

  • rotate: rotate the icons around the circle by degrees
  • radius: set how far out the icons generate
  • circleSize: 1 is a full circle, 0.5 is half circle
  • Speed: sets animation speed
